## ğŸ¯ How to Use This Documentation

### For Project Managers
1. Start with **prd.md** (vision & requirements)
2. Review **epics-and-stories.md** (roadmap)
3. Track progress via **bmm-workflow-status.yaml** & **sprint-2-planning.md**

### For Developers
1. Read **architecture.md** (tech stack, data flow)
2. Check **sprint-2-planning.md** (assigned tasks)
3. Follow **implementation-readiness.md** (checklist before coding)
4. Reference **epics-and-stories.md** (acceptance criteria)

### For QA / Testers
1. Study **qa-checklist.md** (what to test)
2. Review **sprint-2-planning.md** (test scenarios)
3. Use **deployment-guide.md** (post-deploy validation)

### For DevOps / Release Manager
1. Follow **deployment-guide.md** (step-by-step)
2. Reference **implementation-readiness.md** (environment prep)
3. Use **sprint-2-planning.md** (Task 2.4 - Deployment Prep)

### For Stakeholders / Leadership
1. Read **prd.md** (vision, benefits)
2. Skim **architecture.md** (high-level design)
3. Review **bmm-workflow-status.yaml** (progress, metrics)
4. Check **deployment-guide.md** (launch readiness)
